summary: A reupload of Dragon Shouts Rebalanced, but with fixes.
descriptionHtml:
This is the same as [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48657/?]Dragon Shouts Rebalanced[/url] (by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/8618046/?]LazyDreamer[/url]) but with bug fixes which includes making the same changes as the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71214/?]Unofficial Skyrim Legendary Edition Patch[/url]. The mod now actually requires you to be using the unofficial patch.

To make it clear, this is simply a replacement for the old mod and you don't need anything from it.
author: ut110
